name: Space Hurricane Storm: 2 Edition
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Space Hurricane Storm: 2 Edition is a dynamic scrolling shooter where you need to fight back alien invaders who are again trying to seize power in the universe.

But also you are prepared! The ship "LIBERATOR 2", has learned to recover! Now you can resist even more invaders than before!

The main task is to destroy the main ships of the federation. In order to break through their shields, it is necessary to destroy the enemy fleet.

Using different types of weapons, you can make your way through a dangerous space. Dodging an attack, you need to maintain self-control and control over the situation.

This is the final battle! Who will be stronger? Billions of people count on you. Do not fail them!

The fate of the galaxy is in your hands again!
